data.title: I Can't Breathe 2
data.meta_description: KXNG Crooked drops a powerful, anti-police brutality message.
data.text:
KXNG Crooked has shared a powerful new song called "I Can't Breathe 2," in which the Slaughterhouse rapper addresses the subject of police brutality. With disturbing new video footage surfacing almost every day, it's no surprise that Crooked took to venting on wax. The track features the 2Pac instrumental "Pain," a fitting choice considering some of the issues Pac had with police.

Crooked seems depressed on this one, sounding morose in place of his usual high-octane delivery. It goes to show how deep this issue has gone, with people are afraid of those who are supposed to protect them. Dark times, indeed.

Cause they could take Crook's life

Right on Facebook Live

And just acquit the cop who did it

Not even his pension got suspended
